item.title: The 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, ranked!
item.description: Here are the 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, as ranked by an expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists.

item.title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?
item.description: The transfer window is set to open across Europe in January, so what are the top clubs planning? Who comes in? Who will go?

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal, Chelsea eye January move for Marseille's Bakola
item.description: Marseille midfielder Darryl Bakola is attracting interest from Premier League rivals Arsenal and Chelsea. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors...

item.title: Metcalf's 2-game ban upheld, will forfeit $555K
item.description: The NFL upheld DK Metcalf's two-game suspension for his altercation with a fan in Detroit on Sunday.

item.title: Koepka leaving LIV Golf, cites family reasons
item.description: Five-time major champion Brooks Koepka is stepping away from LIV Golf, effective immediately, his representatives said Tuesday.
